statements: SELECT * FROM student_attendance;
SELECT student_id, class_date, attendance_status FROM student_attendance WHERE participation_score > 80;
SELECT student_id, class_date, class_time, participation_score FROM student_attendance WHERE attendance_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM student_attendance WHERE class_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT student_id, class_date, class_time FROM student_attendance ORDER BY class_date DESC, class_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM student_attendance WHERE attendance_status = TRUE ORDER BY class_date DESC, class_time ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT student_id, AVG(participation_score) AS avg_participation_score FROM student_attendance GROUP BY student_id HAVING AVG(participation_score) > 80 ORDER BY avg_participation_score DESC;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(*) AS total_attendance FROM student_attendance WHERE class_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' GROUP BY student_id ORDER BY total_attendance DESC;
SELECT student_id, class_date, class_time FROM student_attendance WHERE attendance_status = FALSE AND class_date >= '2022-09-01' ORDER BY class_date ASC, class_time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT student_id, SUM(participation_score) AS total_participation_score FROM student_attendance WHERE class_date < '2022-06-01' GROUP BY student_id ORDER BY total_participation_score DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM students WHERE attendance_status = True;
SELECT student_name, class_name, class_date FROM students JOIN classes ON students.class_id = classes.class_id;
SELECT student_name FROM students WHERE class_id = 101 ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM students WHERE class_id IN (101, 102) AND attendance_status = False;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM students WHERE attendance_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM classes WHERE class_duration > 60 AND class_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_name, class_name FROM students JOIN classes ON students.class_id = classes.class_id;
SELECT class_name, teacher_name FROM classes WHERE class_date < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY teacher_name ASC;
SELECT student_name, class_name, class_duration FROM students LEFT JOIN classes ON students.class_id = classes.class_id;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, email FROM Students WHERE student_id = 2;
SELECT class_name, start_time, end_time FROM Classes WHERE class_id = 5;
SELECT student_name, date, status FROM Attendance WHERE student_id = 3;
SELECT student_name, email, class_name, date FROM Students JOIN Attendance ON Students.student_id = Attendance.student_id WHERE Students.student_id = 4;
SELECT * FROM Students
SELECT student_name, email FROM Students
SELECT class_id, class_name, start_time, end_time FROM Classes
SELECT student_id, class_id, date, status FROM Attendance
SELECT student_name, class_name, date, status FROM Students, Classes, Attendance WHERE Students.student_id = Attendance.student_id AND Classes.class_id = Attendance.class_id
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_id, student_name, email FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT class_id, class_name FROM classes ORDER BY class_id DESC;
SELECT student_name, email FROM students WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT student_name AS name, email AS contact FROM students WHERE student_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM students JOIN attendance ON students.student_id = attendance.student_id
SELECT student_name, email FROM students WHERE student_id = 1
SELECT class_name, class_description FROM classes WHERE class_id = 2
SELECT student_name, class_name, participation_date FROM students JOIN participation ON students.student_id = participation.student_id JOIN classes ON participation.class_id = classes.class_id
SELECT student_name, class_name, attended FROM students JOIN attendance ON students.student_id = attendance.student_id
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_id, name FROM students ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM classes WHERE instructor='John Doe';
SELECT student_id, class_id, date FROM attendance WHERE present=TRUE;
SELECT student_id, participation_grade FROM participation WHERE participation_grade >= 90;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_id, name, email FROM students WHERE student_id = 3;
SELECT class_name, instructor, COUNT(class_id) AS total_classes FROM classes GROUP BY class_name, instructor;
SELECT student_id, class_id, date, present FROM attendance WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT student_id, class_id, AVG(participation_grade) AS avg_grade FROM participation GROUP BY student_id, class_id HAVING AVG(participation_grade) > 80;
